attributes.action: Ban diesel powered vehicles in London
attributes.background:
Currently in the capital 9,500 people die every year as a result of N02 particulates in the air .N02 causes illnesses such as heart disease ,strokes,lung disease and Cancer.N02 is caused by diesel powered vehicles. This is why we want a ban on diesel powered vehicles
Save London's Air

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. It is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/mayor-assembly/london-assembly/take-part/petitions
